comments.body: even though you set this here, I think you may also need to set it in the test-infra config for the containerd serial suite.

It seems to be working for my local environment. :)
@mtaufen Do we need to do this?

Do you expect log rotation to be on, in general, for the serial suite, or just for this test case? 
If you want it on in general, you need to set it at a higher level (preferably in the test-infra config). 
If just for this test case, here should be fine as long as toggling the gate doesn't require some special handling, like a node restart.
